chapter.text: You approach practice room B. ^1500You cup your hands around your eyes to peek inside. ^1500Itâ€™s dark, but not too dark to see. ^1500You see three music stands with a few pieces of sheet music on each. ^1500As you scan the room, your eyes wander to the ground. ^1500Stacks of sheet music flood the floor, piling a few feet up. ^1500As you continue to glance around the room, your eyes keep meeting the stacks of paper. ^1500Are they getting taller?
